entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023
